DataElement.preferredName: Medication Reason Bottle Not Used Administered Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action._A vessel with a narrow neck designed to accept a specific closure._Not employed or utilized._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test)._A free text field that describes a reason.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
